results.idea: Short-term momentum (5d returns zscore)
results.description: Core: buy stocks with high recent returns. SUGGESTION1: applied (used price only to keep signal clean). SUGGESTION2: not applicable (no vector field). SUGGESTION3: not applied (coverage unknown). SUGGESTION4: not applicable (no userCount metadata). KEEP_IN_MINDs: implementation kept short, uses 2 or fewer datafields and <7 operators. Confidence set to 0.70 because short-term momentum is a robust effect but can be noisy.

results.idea: Medium-term momentum (20d returns scaled)
results.description: Core: medium-term momentum scaled to recent variability. SUGGESTION1: applied (price + ts_std_dev of returns). SUGGESTION2: not applicable. SUGGESTION3: not applied. SUGGESTION4: n/a. KEEP_IN_MINDs respected. Confidence 0.72 reflecting stronger persistence at medium horizons.

results.idea: Momentum acceleration (trend acceleration)
results.description: Core: capture accelerating returns by differencing recent returns. SUGGESTION1: used price only to avoid overfitting. SUGGESTION2: not applicable. SUGGESTION3: not applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs respected. Confidence 0.60 because acceleration adds signal but is noisier.

results.idea: Short-term mean reversion (overnight reversal)
results.description: Core: expect reversal of very short-term moves. SUGGESTION1: used price (overnight = ts_returns price,1). SUGGESTION2: not used. SUGGESTION3: not applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs respected. Confidence 0.58 given typical reversal but sensitivity to microstructure.

results.idea: Volatility breakout signal
results.description: Core: buy when price breaks above recent max beyond volatility band. SUGGESTION1: used price and ts_std_dev. SUGGESTION2: not applicable. SUGGESTION3: not applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs satisfied. Confidence 0.65 — breakout strategies can work but need risk control.

results.idea: Volatility normalized momentum
results.description: Core: normalize recent return by recent volatility to prefer high IR movers. SUGGESTION1: used price for returns and volatility. SUGGESTION2: not applicable. SUGGESTION3: not applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs followed. Confidence 0.68 because volatility-adjusted momentum often improves sharpe.

results.idea: Volume surge momentum
results.description: Core: combine price returns with recent volume spike to find confirmed moves. SUGGESTION1: applied (price + volume). SUGGESTION2: not applicable. SUGGESTION3: if low coverage would use ts_backfill, but data coverage unknown so not applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs kept. Confidence 0.63 because volume confirmation often improves signal.

results.idea: Volume-weighted return (VW momentum)
results.description: Core: weight returns by recent average volume to favor liquid momentum. SUGGESTION1: used price and volume. SUGGESTION2: not applicable. SUGGESTION3: not applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs respected. Confidence 0.66; liquidity-weighted momentum tends to be more tradable.

results.idea: Relative strength vs short-term peer
results.description: Core: cross-sectional rank of 20d returns to pick leaders within universe. SUGGESTION1: applied (price only). SUGGESTION2: not applicable. SUGGESTION3: not applied. SUGGESTION4: n/a. KEEP_IN_MINDs: uses quantile/rank operator. Confidence 0.69 as cross-sectional momentum is persistent.

results.idea: Residual momentum (market-neutral via recent beta)
results.description: Core: regress out market return by using covariance to produce idiosyncratic momentum. SUGGESTION1: applied (price + market_price). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs: fewer than 7 operators. Confidence 0.64 since residual momentum often helps diversify factor risk.

results.idea: Short-term reversal using rank
results.description: Core: rank 5d returns cross-section and take contrarian positions. SUGGESTION1: used price. SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs: simple. Confidence 0.60; known anomaly but requires transaction cost control.

results.idea: Momentum filtered by low idiosyncratic volatility
results.description: Core: prefer momentum in names with low idiosyncratic vol to reduce noise. SUGGESTION1: used price + ts_std_dev. SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs obeyed. Confidence 0.62 — filtering can improve stability.

results.idea: Mean reversion on extreme zscore

results.idea: Momentum with ts_arg_max over volume to identify liquidity peaks
results.description: Core: identify days when volume is maximal in lookback and favor momentum. SUGGESTION1: used price + ts_arg_max(volume, lookback). SUGGESTION2: n/a. SUGGESTION3: n/a. KEEP_IN_MINDs kept. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Momentum with ts_count_nans filter to ensure history reliability
results.description: Core: exclude names with many NaNs historically before ranking. SUGGESTION1: used price + ts_count_nans. SUGGESTION2: n/a. SUGGESTION3: n/a. KEEP_IN_MINDs respected. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Momentum with ts_returns product to identify consistent winners
results.description: Core: product of subperiod returns shows consistency; prefer high product. SUGGESTION1: used price + ts_product. SUGGESTION2: n/a. SUGGESTION3: n/a. KEEP_IN_MINDs kept. Confidence 0.61.

results.idea: Momentum after count of non-NaN days (robust history)
results.description: Core: require minimum valid days in lookback to accept signal using ts_count_nans. SUGGESTION1: used price + ts_count_nans. SUGGESTION2: n/a. SUGGESTION3: n/a. KEEP_IN_MINDs kept. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Momentum combined with inverse vec_range of broker estimates
results.description: Core: low dispersion among broker estimates (vec_range small) supports momentum. SUGGESTION1: used vec_range(estimates_vec) + price. SUGGESTION2: applied vector op. SUGGESTION3: noted possible backfill. KEEP_IN_MINDs kept. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: Momentum with ts_zscore smoothing on returns
results.description: Core: smooth returns zscore with ts_zscore over longer window to reduce noise. SUGGESTION1: used price. SUGGESTION2: n/a. SUGGESTION3: n/a. KEEP_IN_MINDs kept. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: Momentum filtered by decreasing short interest (covering)
results.description: Core: falling short interest combined with positive momentum suggests squeeze relief. SUGGESTION1: used price + short_interest. SUGGESTION2: n/a. SUGGESTION3: if short_interest sparse would backfill. KEEP_IN_MINDs kept. Confidence 0.54.

results.idea: Momentum combined with group_std_dev low (stable peer group)
results.description: Core: prefer momentum when peer group volatility low. SUGGESTION1: used price + sector. SUGGESTION2: n/a. SUGGESTION3: n/a. KEEP_IN_MIND4 observed. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Momentum with ts_regression residual (idiosyncratic trend)
results.description: Core: use regression residual from market to isolate idiosyncratic trend. SUGGESTION1: used price + market_price. SUGGESTION2: n/a. SUGGESTION3: n/a. KEEP_IN_MINDs kept. Confidence 0.62.
